Summary: CMS/mcm Band of light from sky on the ground.
trends: There have been no other sightings in Hot Springs
This sighting has never been favorited.
divs: Sighting Details2005: (Arizona) Saw a band of light hovering above the ground, illuminating the entire farm. Feels it's alien in nature. Possible telepathic influence. Saw a pattern around the base of a cedar tree with an arrow. Grew tired of seeing light and went back to sleep.
